verses.verse: Moreover,<WH1732> David and the captains<WH8269> of the army<WH6635> set apart<WH914> for the service<WH5656> certain of the sons<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623> and of Heman,<WH1968> and of Jeduthun,<WH3038> who should prophesy<WH5012> with harps,<WH3658> with stringed instruments,<WH5035> and with cymbals:<WH4700> and the number<WH4557> of those who did the work<WH582> according to their service was:<WH5656>

of the sons<WH1121> of Asaph:<WH623> Zaccur,<WH2139> and Joseph,<WH3130> and Nethaniah,<WH5418> and Asharelah,<WH841> the sons<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623> under the hand<WH3027> of Asaph,<WH623> who prophesied<WH5012> after the order<WH3027> of the king.<WH4428>

Of Jeduthun;<WH3038> the sons<WH1121> of Jeduthun:<WH3038> Gedaliah,<WH1436> and Zeri,<WH6874> and Jeshaiah,<WH3470> Hashabiah,<WH2811> and Mattithiah,<WH4993> six,<WH8337> under the hands<WH3027> of their father<WH1> Jeduthun<WH3038> with the harp,<WH3658> who prophesied<WH5012> in giving thanks<WH3034> and praising<WH1984> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Of Heman;<WH1968> the sons<WH1121> of Heman:<WH1968> Bukkiah,<WH1232> Mattaniah,<WH4983> Uzziel,<WH5816> Shebuel,<WH7619> and Jerimoth,<WH3406> Hananiah,<WH2608> Hanani,<WH2607> Eliathah,<WH448> Giddalti,<WH1437> and Romamti-Ezer,<WH7320> Joshbekashah,<WH3436> Mallothi,<WH4413> Hothir,<WH1956> Mahazioth.<WH4238>

All these were the sons<WH1121> of Heman<WH1968> the king<WH4428>'s seer<WH2374> in the words<WH1697> of God,<WH430> to lift up<WH7311> the horn.<WH7161> God<WH430> gave<WH5414> to Heman<WH1968> fourteen<WH702> sons<WH1121> and three<WH7969> daughters.<WH1323>

All these were under the hands<WH3027> of their father<WH1> for song<WH7892> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> with cymbals,<WH4700> stringed instruments,<WH5035> and harps,<WH3658> for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430> Asaph,<WH623> Jeduthun,<WH3038> and Heman<WH1968> being under the order<WH3027> of the king.<WH4428>

The number<WH4557> of them,<WH251> with their brothers who were instructed<WH3925> in singing<WH7892> to Yahweh,<WH3068> even all who were skillful,<WH995> was two hundred<WH3967> eighty<WH8084> - eight.<WH8083>
They cast<WH5307> lots<WH1486> for<WH5980> their offices,<WH4931> all alike,<WH6996> as well the small as the great,<WH1419> the teacher<WH995> as the scholar.<WH8527>
Now the first<WH7223> lot<WH1486> came forth<WH3318> for Asaph<WH623> to Joseph:<WH3130> the second<WH8145> to Gedaliah;<WH1436> he and his brothers<WH251> and sons<WH1121> were twelve:<WH8147>
the third<WH7992> to Zaccur,<WH2139> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the fourth<WH7243> to Izri,<WH3339> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the fifth<WH2549> to Nethaniah,<WH5418> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the sixth<WH8345> to Bukkiah,<WH1232> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the seventh<WH7637> to Jesharelah,<WH3480> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the eighth<WH8066> to Jeshaiah,<WH3470> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the ninth<WH8671> to Mattaniah,<WH4983> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the tenth<WH6224> to Shimei,<WH8096> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the eleventh<WH6249> to Azarel,<WH5832> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
the twelfth<WH8147> to Hashabiah,<WH2811> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the thirteenth,<WH7969> Shubael,<WH7619> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the fourteenth,<WH702> Mattithiah,<WH4993> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the fifteenth<WH2568> to Jeremoth,<WH3406> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the sixteenth<WH8337> to Hananiah,<WH2608> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the seventeenth<WH7651> to Joshbekashah,<WH3436> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the eighteenth<WH8083> to Hanani,<WH2607> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the nineteenth<WH8672> to Mallothi,<WH4413> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the twentieth<WH6242> to Eliathah,<WH448> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the one<WH259> and twentieth<WH6242> to Hothir,<WH1956> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the two<WH8147> and twentieth<WH6242> to Giddalti,<WH1437> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the three<WH7969> and twentieth<WH6242> to Mahazioth,<WH4238> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve:<WH8147>
for the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> to Romamti-Ezer,<WH7320> his sons<WH1121> and his brothers,<WH251> twelve.<WH8147>
